statements: DELETE FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name = 'Apple' AND market_share > 20;
DELETE FROM competitor_data WHERE revenue < 10000 OR product_name = 'Smartphone';
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 1000;
DELETE FROM market_research WHERE study_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM competitors WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp';
DELETE FROM market_research WHERE study_location = 'New York' AND researcher_name = 'John Doe';
